title: Why your savings account’s interest rates are trailing the Fed’s
itunes:title: Why your savings account’s interest rates are trailing the Fed’s
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to raise interest rates yet again next week as it looks to double down on inflation. Even with all the rate hikes, interest rates on savings accounts are still lagging. Today, we’ll explore how supply and demand play a role. Plus, a data deep dive in the Weekly Wrap, an anticipated shipping downturn and a costly cleanup for the San Francisco Bay.
